label: 大夫
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A title held by the head of some government or quasi-government organs, such as the Office of Upkeep or the Empress’s Household; and by the second-level official in others, such as the Bureau of War.  The title properly carried the fifth rank, upper or lower grade. [Also read Daifu][RK]
